A seal placed on the [[Fire Temple]]'s gate to protect against intruders from the outside world. The two statues placed on either side of the gate form a barrier. Only [[ninja monk]]s of the temple have access to enter due to the special chakra gifted from the [[Gift of the Hermit Group]]. However, a powerful enough physical strike can break through the defences, as demonstrated with [[Kakuzu]]'s [[Earth Release: Earth Spear]].
